perturbation.original_text: JANA represents and warrants to the Company that this Agreement has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by JANA, and is a valid and binding obligation of JANA, enforceable against JANA in accordance with its terms. As of the date of this Agreement, JANA beneficially owns 6,745,623 shares of the Company's common stock and has voting authority over such shares.
perturbation.changed_text: JANA represents and warrants to the Company that this Agreement has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by JANA, and is a valid and binding obligation of JANA, enforceable against JANA in accordance with its terms. As of the date of this Agreement, the Shareholder beneficially owns 6,745,623 shares of the Company's common stock and has voting authority over such shares.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'JANA' is changed to 'Shareholder.' It is now unclear if 'JANA' and 'Shareholder' refer to the same entity. The contract relies on this distinction throughout, so introducing a contradiction here can create uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: Other than the JANA Nominees, the Board will only nominate eight (8) individuals for election at the 2014 Annual Meeting, including Mr. Koffel subject to Section 4(b) of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Other than the JANA Candidates, the Board will only nominate eight (8) individuals for election at the 2014 Annual Meeting, including Mr. Koffel subject to Section 4(b) of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'JANA Nominees' is replaced by 'JANA Candidates', without clarifying if 'Nominees' and 'Candidates' refers to the same entity. This affects the enforcement and interpretation of the agreement and creates uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: During the Cooperation Period, JANA shall cause all shares of the Company's capital stock ("Shares") beneficially owned, directly or indirectly, by it, or by any of its Affiliates or Associates (including without limitation all Shares beneficially owned as of the respective record dates for the 2014 Annual Meeting and as of the record dates for any special meeting of shareholders) over which it exercises or has voting authority, to be present for quorum purposes and to be voted, at such meetings or at any adjournments or postponements thereof, in favor of the current members of the Board (including the JANA Nominees) that will be up for election at such meetings, and not to submit any proposal for consideration at, or bring any other business before, the 2014 Annual Meeting or initiate, encourage or participate in any "withhold" or similar campaign with respect to the election of directors at the 2014 Annual Meeting and shall not permit any of its Affiliates or Associates to do any of the foregoing or publicly or privately encourage or support any other stockholder to take any such actions.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Cooperation Period, JANA shall cause all shares of the Company's capital stock ("Shares") beneficially owned, directly or indirectly, by it, or by any of its Affiliates or Associates (including without limitation all Shares beneficially owned as of the respective record dates for the 2014 Annual Meeting and as of the record dates for any special meeting of shareholders) over which it exercises or has voting authority, to be present for quorum purposes and to be voted, at such meetings or at any adjournments or postponements thereof, in favor of the current members of the Board (including the Nominees) that will be up for election at such meetings, and not to submit any proposal for consideration at, or bring any other business before, the 2014 Annual Meeting or initiate, encourage or participate in any "withhold" or similar campaign with respect to the election of directors at the 2014 Annual Meeting and shall not permit any of its Affiliates or Associates to do any of the foregoing or publicly or privately encourage or support any other stockholder to take any such actions.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'JANA Nominees' is replaced by 'Nominees', without clarifying if the 'Nominees' refers to the same entity. This creates confusion about who the current member of the board are.
